title: Studio One Pro 7 Perpetual License & 12 Months Studio One Pro+ Access Key — Music Production Recording DAW Software with Extra Access to 100GB Cloud Storage, Plug-Ins, Mix Effects, Loops & Samples
description: Studio One Pro 7 is the ultimate production powerhouse designed to elevate your creativity from start to finish. With over 30 new features and improvements, like fast and intuitive editing and mixing, integrated pattern workflows, time-aligning drums, award-winning notation, seamless mastering, rock-solid live performance, and Studio One Pro's pioneering drag-and-drop workflow, Studio One Pro 7 sets a new standard for creative music production and performance. In addition to your perpetual license (which is yours to keep), you'll also get 12 months of access to Studio One Pro+, which gives you unlimited access to a library of 15,000+ plug-ins, loops, and samples, award-winning notation and composition software, exclusive member community and tools, monthly livestreams and live mix critiques, 100 GB of cloud storage, and more."
